attributes.action: For the Greek Government to permit burials of deceased refugees on hospital land
attributes.additional_details:
Human Aid organisations are currently in Lesvos and are staging a protest outside the town hall in Mithilini tomorrow 12th November 2015 to desperately plead for consent to be given for the land provided by the hospital to become a cemetery 
The deceased have not been provided their right in being laid to rest.
This contravenes human rights 
We must act now!
attributes.background:
Dr Mustapha ..Mithilini Hospital Lesvos Island
He is desperately pleading for the Greek Government to consent to hospital land being used as a cemetery to bury at least 70 bodies of deceased refugees who have been dead for over a month
Their relatives are in significant distress.

rejection.details: This site is for petitions calling on the UK Government or Parliament to act. Your petition calls for action from the Government of Greece.
